scripts.install-all: cd frontend && bun install --save-text-lockfile && cd ../server && bun install --save-text-lockfile
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../server && bun run lint
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../server && bun test
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && bun run bun:dev" "cd frontend && bun run start"
